type.name: org.gradle.api.internal.DynamicObjectAware
type.description: An object that can present a dynamic view of itself. The exposed dynamic object may provide functionality over and above what the type implementing this interface can do. For example, the DynamicObject may provide the ability to register new properties or implement methods that this object does not provide in a concrete way.

method.name: getAsDynamicObject
method.description:
Returns a DynamicObject for this object. This should include all static and dynamic properties and methods for this object.

returns:The dynamic object.

property.name: asDynamicObject
property.description:
Returns a DynamicObject for this object. This should include all static and dynamic properties and methods for this object.

returns:The dynamic object.
